content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Max. I am not Mister Heine, I am Peter Schmidt, the landlord of the apartment. Now, let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mr. Schmidt. Let's say you want to rent the apartment for 800 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are not even close to the rental price I am seeking. I am looking for a much higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Mr. Schmidt. Let's say you want to rent the apartment for 1000 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price can be higher. Let's negotiate more.
